title: Ride

abstract: 'The wind in your hair, the feeling of speed, the look on people's faces...'
description: Matt Hunt talks candidly about his all-consuming addiction: riding bikes. It is an obsession that has changed the way he looks at the world, cost him physically and financially but one that he is not likely to give up soon.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002321; Western stories : expressions for the future; Active; 2010
